Package Brewmaster

Class ServerThread

java.lang.Object
Brewmaster.ServerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class ServerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

ServerThread

The ServerThread class is used to as a server for an android monitor temprature monitor app.
Since:
2020-23-9

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.io.PrintWriter output
    The PrintWriter is used to send formatted data from TemperatureHandler to android app.
    (package private) int SERVER_PORT
    The Integer is used to store the server port number.
    (package private) java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket
    The ServerSocket used for connections.
    (package private) TemperatureHandler th
    The TemperatureHandler is the object that stores all relevant information.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Sets up a ServerSocket and accepts connections. After connection it starts sending information in the following order minTemp, currentTemp, maxTemp,daysLastCheck and state. if at any point an IOException occurs it will start a new thread and try to run again.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      See Also:
      TemperatureHandler.getMinTemp(), TemperatureHandler.getCurrentTemp(), TemperatureHandler.getMaxTemp(), TemperatureHandler.getDaysLastCheck(), TemperatureHandler.getState()
